idea-plugin.name: Protobuf Erlang
idea-plugin.description:
Support Erlang record fields resolve to proto file - make sure your proto file into path [like this](https://github.com/yidayoung/intellij-protobuf-editor#path-settings) - make sure your proto trans to record not maps
then plugin will support proto record resolve to proto not generated record define also field support doc if there has document in proto file
